name: Bridge
description: Serve models declaratively from your model registry.

BRIDGE_ANALYTICS_OPT_OUT.description: Set to 1 to opt out of Mixpanel analytics.

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: Credentials for accessing model artifacts and Sagemaker (if applicable)

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: Credentials for accessing model artifacts and Sagemaker (if applicable)

AWS_DEFAULT_REGION.description: AWS region for Sagemaker deployments (if applicable).
